casebody.data:
Yesenia PEREZ, Juanen Perez, Michelle Perez, Emilio Perez and Gladys Perez Individually and on Behalf of Bernardo Perez-Santos
v.
The CITY OF NEW ORLEANS, Entergy New Orleans, Inc., and Central Rock Corporation 2019-CC-0378 Supreme Court of Louisiana. May 28, 2019

ON SUPERVISORY WRITS TO THE CIVIL DISTRICT COURT FOR THE PARISH OF ORLEANS

Writ denied. CRICHTON, J., would grant and assigns reasons. Crichton, J. would grant and assigns reasons. I would grant the writ application of Defendant Entergy New Orleans, Inc. and Audubon Nature Institute, Inc., assign the case for briefing and permit the parties' opportunity to request oral argument in compliance with La. Code Civ. P. art. 966(H).
